title: Drink driving
desc: Legal Aid NSW does provide support for this legal matter. You will soon be provided with a guide which will help you prepare for the next steps in your legal situation.
note:
Please note

If you answer ‘YES’ to either of these questions, you should seek legal help as soon as possible: 

  1. Is this a mid to high range drink driving offence?
  2. Have you been convicted of any drink driving offences in the last five years?
aboutYouStep2Title: Do any of these apply to you?
